review: I am really enjoying casting movies and videos to my 50" tv monitor. Picture quality is excellent.
author: Russell Smith

review: Up and running within minutes.  I primarily use it for a spare room's TV that is an older, but still decent HDTV.  Plug it in and within minutes you're on the Wifi and streaming Netflix.  Cant be any simpler or easier to use.
author: Myles Deacon

review: Love it! This saves me from having to boot up my ancient laptop to play stuff on my TV. The only thing that I don't like is that the Chromecast app that works with this device doesn't seem to be able to play sound on .mkv files. However, there's another downloadable app that you can get that fixes that, so it's no problem!The Chromecast is fast and easy to set up, and it's cool that you can launch it from pretty much any device.
author: Alyssa Grant

review: I love this to stream YouTube videos and Netflix to my television!  Great product!
author: Ashley Spangler

review: Loooooove dat chromecast doooee.No but seriously, if you have the option to hook this up to your television, do it. Netflix marathons on the couch, na'sayin?
